original_text: Now look at my hands and my feet. It is really me! Touch me. Then you will know that I am not a spirit. A spirit does not have a body with skin and bones. You can see that I have a real body.’
korean_text: 내 손과 발을 보고 나인 줄 알라 또 나를 만져 보라 영은 살과 뼈가 없으되 너희 보는 바와 같이 나는 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Now look at my hands and my feet
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내 손과 내 발을 보아라

sentences.original_text: that I am not a spirit
A spirit does not have a body
You can see that I have a real body
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 보다시피 나는 실제 몸을 갖고 있단다
